summary: 'The Good Fight' Signs Up Michael Sheen for Season Three
title: 'The Good Fight' Signs Up Michael Sheen for Season Three
excerpt: Michael Sheen, soon to be seen in Amazon Prime Video’s Good Omens opposite David Tennant, has joined the cast of The Good Fight for the show's 3rd season.

summary: Michael Sheen entra nella terza stagione di The Good Fight - ScreenWEEK.it Blog
title: Michael Sheen entra nella terza stagione di The Good Fight - ScreenWEEK.it Blog
excerpt: L'attore inglese sarà un personaggio ricorrente nei nuovi episodi dello spin-off di The Good Wife. In TV Sheen ha già ottenuto l'enorme successo di Mastes of Sex e tornerà sul piccolo schermo anche con Good Omens, tratto dal libro Buona apocalisse di Neil Gaiman. The Good Wife stagione 3 arriverà sulla CBS all'inizio del prossimo anno.
description:
Una serie TV di culto come The Good Fight sta per aggiungere un attore di enorme talento al suo già notevolissimo cast. Michael Sheen avrà infatti un ruolo fisso nella terza stagione, che arriverà sulla CBS all’inizio del prossimo anno. L’attore interpreterà l’avvocato Roland Blum. Un personaggio che si preannuncia particolarmente adatto alle doti istrioniche di Sheen, in quanto viene descritto come brillante, carismatico, dedito al piacere dei sensi e della carne e deciso a vincere molto più di quanto non lo sia a ottenere giustizia.

Come tutti sanno Michael Sheen è già stato magnifico protagonista insieme a Lizzy Caplan dell’altra serie di culto Masters of Sex, per cui l’attore ha ottenuto una candidatura ai Golden Globe. Prossimamente tornerà sul piccolo schermo anche con Good Omens, show ispirato al romanzo Buona apocalisse di Neil Gaiman.

Love this review.

summary: Know anywhere I can watch Slaughterhouse Rulz in U.S  I love both Michael and Simon and seen that they both worked together is a...
question: Know anywhere I can watch Slaughterhouse Rulz in U.S  I love both Michael and Simon and seen that they both worked together is a must see and also had the guy from Shaun of the dead with him too loved that movie. I remembered Michael and Lizzy going to his Worlds end  premier now working together 💕
answer: Sadly not, I’m afraid. Maybe it will be in theaters in the U.S. in a month or two. But if a good quality torrent pops up, I’ll try to upload it to Vimeo but, again, that likely won’t be until a few months from now when it’s released on DVD or digitally to buy.

reblog.comment: Sadly not, I’m afraid. Maybe it will be in theaters in the U.S. in a month or two. But if a good quality torrent pops up, I’ll try to upload it to Vimeo but, again, that likely won’t be until a few months from now when it’s released on DVD or digitally to buy.

summary: Do you think Michael Sheen and Lizzy Caplan are still friends?
question: Do you think Michael Sheen and Lizzy Caplan are still friends?
answer: I think they’re friends in the sense that if they saw each other at an event, they would be happy to see each other and chat for a few minutes, but not friends that would go to a music concert together. I can’t picture them hanging out for some reason. Don’t get me wrong, I know they got along great on set but their relationship doesn’t strike me as the type where they’d go out together or talk regularly. I would be very, very, very surprised if we heard about or saw pictures of them somewhere outside of a professional/acting related event.

reblog.comment: I think they’re friends in the sense that if they saw each other at an event, they would be happy to see each other and chat for a few minutes, but not friends that would go to a music concert together. tags: michael sheen wouldnt have done it
summary: I can think of nothing bad to say about Michael Sheen. What bad is there to say about a man who’s wife cheated on him and his...
body: I can think of nothing bad to say about Michael Sheen. What bad is there to say about a man who’s wife cheated on him and his response was “That’s okay. I can’t be with you anymore but I’ll still be there for you and the baby”? All his exes still love him AND each other. Like, this dude is playing an angel for a reason.

reblog.comment: I can think of nothing bad to say about Michael Sheen. What bad is there to say about a man who’s wife cheated on him and his response was “That’s okay. I can’t be with you anymore but I’ll still be there for you and the baby”? All his exes still love him AND each other. Like, this dude is playing an angel for a reason.

blog.name: moviemosaics
blog.title: Movie Mosaics
blog.description: My name is Miles and I like movies! Posted here are a collection of photo grids from movies that I feel are particularly visually interesting. My hope is that by looking at these shots, one can get a sense of the film's style and an appreciation for the way we use aesthetics to tell story through the medium of film. Follow at instagram.com/moviemosaics

blog.name: haslemere
blog.title: Dwell in possibility...
blog.description:
Hi! Thiis is my fan blog. 
@thatdanstevens @haslemere1 I love a character who is stridently confident yet easily confused. (my favorite tweet...)
 "Sometimes you can know too much. Of all people I know this to be true. Ignorance is bliss. Knowledge is power. Which would you prefer." Stef Penney The Invisible Ones 
"What would Henry James have made of us, I wonder?" Nick replies..."He'd have been very kind to us, he'd have said how wonderful and how beautiful we were, he'd have given us incredibly subtle things to say, and we wouldn't have realized until just before the end that he'd seen right through us." Alan Hollinghurst The Line of Beauty 
“They did not talk about the larger present, so circumscribed, so uncontrollable. Their little present was two bodies and a bed, and that was the entirety of time and place: them, there, in their little room, awkward, laughing, happy, warm, tentative, surrendering, overwhelmed, alarmed, astounded, shivering, subsiding, asleep, awake, getting the hang of it, learning, loving, redeemed. Happy.” ― Louisa Young, My Dear I Wanted to Tell You 
Hello You will find this blog dedicated to the Great War Centenary with images and articles I find relevant. I love history, architecture, archaeology and so those also be blogged prominently. 
I adore Dan Stevens and will create, reblog, and generally wax lyrical about him. I believe he's a most excellent actor, full of charm and snark, and I wish him nothing but success. ...
I will defend Beauty and the Beast for all eternity,
LEGION is epic!
My other current favorite TV shows are Game of Thrones, The Americans, Man in the High Castle, Shetland, and Grey's Anatomy. 
Viggo Mortensen and Douglas Henshall are my secret honies. 
I also love Richard Armitage most dearly. 
I love Broadway.
I love Hamilton.
I love Raul Esparza.
I think very highly of Michael Fassbender (erm...yeah), Gael Garcia Bernal, Clive Owen, Hayley Atwell, Audra McDonald, Hattie Morahan, and Emma Thompson. 
My OTP is (!) Mary x Matthew (Downton Abbey) and that will never change. Therefore expect a lot of MM love from me. Look around and enjoy!!
